document_api_meta.title: Search Returns
document_api_meta.env_desc: Use this API to retrieve one or more returns. This API supports filtering returns using query parameters. You can filter returns by create time, update time, return status, or return types.

request_header_param.name: x-tts-access-token
request_header_param.desc: The seller access_token value from [Get Access Token](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/678e3a3292b0f40314a92d75#Get%20Access%20Token%20API), when user_type = 0. Follow this [guide](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/678e3a344ddec3030b238fa0) to get seller access_token.

request_query_param.name: app_key
request_query_param.desc: Every single app will have a unique key. Please use the specific key assigned to your app.

request_query_param.name: sign
request_query_param.desc: Signature generated by gen algorithm. When you send API requests to TTS, you must sign them so that TTS can identify the senders.

request_query_param.name: timestamp
request_query_param.desc: Unix timestamp GMT (UTC+00:00). This timestamp is used across all API requests. Developers can use this convert to local time.

request_query_param.name: sort_field
request_query_param.desc:
The returned results will be sorted by the specified field. 
Default: `create_time`
Possible values:
- `create_time`
- `update_time`

Specify the order for sorting the returned results by using the `sort_order` parameter.

request_query_param.name: sort_order
request_query_param.desc:
The sort order for the `sort_field` parameter. Default: ASC
Possible values:
- `ASC`: Ascending order
- `DESC`: Descending order

request_query_param.name: page_size
request_query_param.desc: The number of results to be returned per page. Default: 10. Valid range: [10-50].

request_query_param.name: page_token
request_query_param.desc: An opaque token used to retrieve the next page of a paginated result set. Retrieve this value from the result of the `next_page_token` from a previous response. It is not needed for the first page.

request_query_param.name: shop_cipher
request_query_param.desc:
Use this property to pass shop information in requesting the API. Failure in passing the correct value when requesting the API for cross-border shops will return incorrect response. 
Get by API [Get Authorization Shop](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/6507ead7b99d5302be949ba9?external_id=6507ead7b99d5302be949ba9)

request_body_param.name: order_ids
request_body_param.desc: List of TikTok Shop order IDs.

request_body_param.name: buyer_user_ids
request_body_param.desc: List of TikTok Shop buyer user IDs.

request_body_param.name: return_types
request_body_param.desc:
List of return types.
Available values:
- `REFUND`
- `RETURN_AND_REFUND`
- `REPLACEMENT`

request_body_param.name: return_status
request_body_param.desc:
List of return status.
Available values:
- `RETURN_OR_REFUND_REQUEST_PENDING`: Buyer has initiated a return or refund request. The request is pending review by seller or system. 
- `REFUND_OR_RETURN_REQUEST_REJECT`: The return or refund request was rejected. 
- `AWAITING_BUYER_SHIP`: The return request was approved. The seller is waiting for the buyer to ship the approved items to the seller. If the buyer doesn't ship the items to the seller before the deadline, the platform will close the request.
- `BUYER_SHIPPED_ITEM`: Buyer has shipped the approved items to seller.
- `REJECT_RECEIVE_PACKAGE`: Seller inspected the returned items and rejected the return request. 
- `RETURN_OR_REFUND_REQUEST_SUCCESS`: The return/refund request was successful. The buyer will be refunded.
- `RETURN_OR_REFUND_REQUEST_CANCEL`: The request has been cancelled by the buyer or system.
- `RETURN_OR_REFUND_REQUEST_COMPLETE`: The return/refund was processed successfully. The buyer has been refunded.
- `AWAITING_BUYER_RESPONSE`: Seller offer another return type to the buyer, and waiting buyer response. Seller proposed return type can check the `seller_proposed_return_type`.

request_body_param.name: seller_proposed_return_type
request_body_param.desc:
List of seller proposed return types.
Available values:
- `PARTIAL_REFUND`

request_body_param.name: create_time_ge
request_body_param.desc:
Filter returns to show only those that are created on or after the specified date and time. Unix timestamp.

Note:
`create_time_ge` and `create_time_le` together constitute the creation time filter condition.
- If `create_time_ge` is filled but `create_time_le` is empty, `create_time_le` will default to the current time.
- If `create_time_lt` is filled but `create_time_ge` is empty, `create_time_ge` will default to the earliest shop time.

request_body_param.name: arbitration_status
request_body_param.desc:
List of arbitration statuses. 
Available values:
- `IN_PROGRESS`: The TikTok Shop platform operator is processing arbitration. Platform may request additional information from the seller.  
- `SUPPORT_BUYER`: The platform operator supports buyer.
- `SUPPORT_SELLER`: The platform operator supports seller.
- `CLOSED`: Arbitration is closed.

request_body_param.name: update_time_ge
request_body_param.desc:
Filter returns to show only those that are updated on or after the specified date and time. Unix timestamp.

Note:
`update_time_ge` and `update_time_le` together define the update time filter condition.
- If `update_time_ge` is filled but `update_time_le` is empty, `update_time_le` will default to the current time.
- If `update_time_lt` is filled but `update_time_ge` is empty, `update_time_ge` will default to the earliest shop time.

request_body_param.name: update_time_lt
request_body_param.desc:
Filter returns to show only those that are created before the specified date and time. Unix timestamp.
Refer to notes in `create_time_ge` for more usage information.

request_body_param.name: locale
request_body_param.desc:
The BCP-47 locale codes for displaying the returns, delimited by commas. Default: `en`
Refer to [Locale codes](678e3a47bae28f030a8c7523) for the list of supported locale codes.

request_body_param.name: create_time_lt
request_body_param.desc:
Filter returns to show only those that are created before the specified date and time. Unix timestamp.
Refer to notes in `create_time_ge` for more usage information.

response_param.name: code
response_param.desc: The success or failure status code returned in API response.

response_param.name: message
response_param.desc: The success or failure messages returned in API response. Reasons of failure will be described in the message.

response_param.name: ^^order_id
response_param.desc: TikTok Shop order ID. Contains multiple order line item IDs.

response_param.name: ^^return_id
response_param.desc: The identifier of a specific return.

response_param.name: ^^return_type
response_param.desc:
Return type.
Available values:
- `REFUND`: Seller will issue a refund without return. The buyer is not required to send the item(s) back to the seller.
- `RETURN_AND_REFUND`: Buyer is required to send the item(s) back to the seller. The seller will need to review the condition of the returned item(s) before a refund can be issued to the buyer. 
- `REPLACEMENT`: The buyer requires the seller to replace the item(s).

response_param.name: ^^return_status
response_param.desc:
Return status.
Available values:
- `RETURN_OR_REFUND_REQUEST_PENDING`: Buyer has initiated a return or refund request. The request is pending review by seller or platform. 
- `REFUND_OR_RETURN_REQUEST_REJECT`: The return or refund request was rejected. 
- `AWAITING_BUYER_SHIP`: The return request was approved. The seller is waiting for the buyer to ship the approved items to the seller. If the buyer doesn't ship the items to the seller before the deadline, the platform will close the request.
- `BUYER_SHIPPED_ITEM`: Buyer has shipped the approved items to seller.
- `REJECT_RECEIVE_PACKAGE`: Seller inspected the returned items and rejected the return package. 
- `RETURN_OR_REFUND_REQUEST_SUCCESS`: The return/refund request was approved. The buyer will be refunded.
- `RETURN_OR_REFUND_REQUEST_CANCEL`: The request has been cancelled by the buyer or system. 
- `RETURN_OR_REFUND_REQUEST_COMPLETE`: The return/refund was processed successfully. The buyer has been refunded.
- `REPLACEMENT_REQUEST_PENDING`: Buyer has initiated a replacement request. The request is pending review by seller.
- `REPLACEMENT_REQUEST_REJECT`: Seller reject the buyer replacement request.
- `REPLACEMENT_REQUEST_REFUND_SUCCESS`: Buyer's replacement request was resolved by refund due to insufficient inventory.
- `REPLACEMENT_REQUEST_CANCEL`: Buyer canceled the replacement request.
- `REPLACEMENT_REQUEST_COMPLETE`: Seller has approved the buyer's replacement request, platform will generate a new order for seller to fulfill.
- `AWAITING_BUYER_RESPONSE`: Seller offer another return type to the buyer, and waiting buyer response. Seller proposed return type can check the `seller_proposed_return_type`.

response_param.name: ^^arbitration_status
response_param.desc:
List of arbitration statuses. 
Available values:
- `IN_PROGRESS`: The TikTok Shop platform operator is processing arbitration. Platform may request additional information from the seller.  
- `SUPPORT_BUYER`: The platform operator supports buyer.
- `SUPPORT_SELLER`: The platform operator supports seller.
- `CLOSED`: Arbitration is closed

response_param.name: ^^role
response_param.desc:
Return initiation role.
Available values:
- `BUYER`
- `SELLER`
- `OPERATOR` : TikTok Shop platform operator.
- `SYSTEM`:  TikTok Shop system.
Please see "API overview" to learn more about roles.

response_param.name: ^^return_reason_text
response_param.desc:
Reason for return, in localized text.
You can change language using the locale request parameter.

response_param.name: ^^shipment_type
response_param.desc:
The shipment method the buyer selected to send the item(s) back to seller
Available values:
- `PLATFORM`: Buyer will use TikTok Shop's shipping service to send the items back to seller. Use the `handover_method` field to see which handover method the buyer is using, `drop_off` or `pickup`. 
- `BUYER_ARRANGE`: Buyer will arrange shipment to send the item(s) back to seller.

response_param.name: ^^handover_method
response_param.desc:
The handover method buyer chooses to use when returning item(s) to seller using platform's shipping service. 
- `DROP_OFF`: buyer will drop off the item(s) at courier 
- `PICKUP`: buyer is scheduling a pick up service offered by the courier.

response_param.name: ^^return_tracking_number
response_param.desc: The tracking number of parcels when buyer returns the item(s).

response_param.name: ^^return_provider_name
response_param.desc: The provider name of parcel when buyer returns the item(s).

response_param.name: ^^return_provider_id
response_param.desc: The provider ID of parcel when buyer returns the items.

response_param.name: ^^pre_return_id
response_param.desc: The previous return ID the current return order is edited from.

response_param.name: ^^next_return_id
response_param.desc: The next return ID the current return order is edited to.

response_param.name: ^^can_buyer_keep_item
response_param.desc: Whether buyer can keep the item(s) in a return or replacement process.

response_param.name: ^^^deadline
response_param.desc: Indicates the deadline for when seller must perform the next action.

response_param.name: ^^^product_name
response_param.example: (SP) [PROMO BUNDLING] NICE Tissue Facial 180s x 5 pcs

response_param.name: ^^^^refund_shipping_fee
response_param.desc: Shipping fee refund amount to buyer.

response_param.name: ^^^^retail_delivery_fee
response_param.desc: Retail delivery fee takes effect once platform GMV exceeds 500,000 USD, according to US Colorado states' compliance rules.

response_param.name: ^^^product_seller_discount
response_param.desc: The refund amount of product seller discount.

response_param.name: ^^^shipping_fee_platform_discount
response_param.desc: The refund amount of shipping fee platform discount.

response_param.name: ^^^shipping_fee_seller_discount
response_param.desc: The refund amount of shipping fee seller discount.

response_param.name: ^^^product_platform_discount
response_param.desc: The refund amount of platform discount.

response_param.name: ^^^seller_paid_return_shipping_fee
response_param.desc: The amount of return shipping fee seller paid.

response_param.name: ^^^platform_paid_return_shipping_fee
response_param.desc: The amount of return shipping fee platform paid.

response_param.name: ^^^buyer_paid_return_shipping_fee
response_param.desc: The amount of return shipping fee buyer paid.

response_param.name: ^^^refund_subtotal
response_param.desc: Subtotal refund amount. This is the total price of all items returned.

response_param.name: ^^^retail_delivery_fee
response_param.desc: Retail delivery fee takes effect once platform GMV exceeds 500,000 USD, according to US Colorado states' compliance rules.

response_param.name: ^^return_shipping_document_type
response_param.desc:
The type of return shipping document selected by the buyer. 
Available values:
- `SHIPPING_LABE`L
- `QR_CODE`

response_param.name: ^^return_method
response_param.desc:
Return method:
- `SELLER_SHIPPED`: Seller offers the return shipping service.
- `BUYER_SHIPPED`: Buyer offers the return shipping service.
- `PLATFORM_SHIPPED`: TikTok Shop offers the return shipping service.

response_param.name: ^^is_combined_return
response_param.desc: This field will return true if the buyer is asking to combine multiple returns into one return package.

response_param.name: ^^combined_return_id
response_param.desc: If `is_combined_return` is `true`, this field will return the `combined_return_id` associated with the combined return.

response_param.name: ^^^amount
response_param.desc:
The partial refund amount offered by seller.
Note: only seller proposed partial refund will return this field.

response_param.name: ^^buyer_rejected_partial_refund
response_param.desc:
Only return this field when seller initiated the partial refund.
Available values:
- `TRUE`: Buyer reject the seller partial refund offer.
- `FALSE`: Buyer accept the seller partial refund offer or awaiting buyer response.

response_param.name: ^^return_warehouse_address
response_param.desc: The return warehouse address details provided by the seller.

response_param.name: ^total_count
response_param.desc: The number of returns that meet the query conditions.

response_param.name: ^next_page_token
response_param.desc: An opaque token used to retrieve the next page of a paginated result set. Provide this value in the `page_token` parameter of your request if the current response does not return all the results.

error_code_list.msg: An invalid request parameter was passed. Please check that you have the correct parameter type(s) and format.
No permission to process this order
Internal error. Please try again. If the issue persists after multiple attempts, please contact platform support.

sample_code.label: Go
Node.js
Java

scope_list.package_description: The Partner will be able to manage seller's return and refund requests.
scope_list.auth_info: The Partner will be able to manage your return and refund requests.
